name: Twinsanity: Omicron - Special Edition
description:
STORY:

Twinsanity: Omicron - Special Edition is an RPG game developed by Twinsanity's Channel and Ale Sketching. The Story Extends. Two days after defeating Time Shadow, Twinsanity is taking rest in EastCity. Exploring the city, he realises that someone wants his power.  Are you ready to solve the mystery?

FEATURES:

-Hacking

-Unlockable Costumes

-Stop-Motion Cutscenes

-Frame by Frame Animation

-New Weapons and Items

SPECIAL EDITION:

- Ms. Viper's Backstory

- Mr. Cooper and The Diamond Soul

- Hack Challenge

- 5 New Costumes
